child_adult(INITIATOR_underwearType==Diaper,RECIPIENT_relationship==Parent,RECIPIENT_gender==Male,RECIPIENT_trait==dislikes children)->Daddy, pwease you no beated me wiff da belt! Me sowwy fuh makeded da poopy in me diapee! Me no do dat ebba 'gain you no beated me! Pwease?! *starts whimpering*
